description:
From Bugzilla Helper:
User-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0b; Windows NT 5.0)
BuildID:    CVS pull of trunk on 20010914

When a download automatically launches winzip and all browser instances other 
than the download window are closed, then when the download window 
automatically closes after launching winzip it deletes the zip file. This means 
the file opened in winzip is no longer valid and can't be used.

Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open above URL.
2. Select open using WinZip and press OK.
3. Close any open browser windows apart from the download window.
4. Winzip will load the zip file when the download finishes, the download 
window closes, then press extract in winzip.

Actual Results:  Winzip shows error message that the archive is no longer 
available.

Expected Results:  Should be able to use downloaded archive.

This is related to bugs 63105 and 76743.
summary: Downloaded zip files are no longer available after the browser closes
